title: Includes within crime of assault in the 2nd degree infliction of physical injury upon school district supervisory personnel
summary: Includes activity constituting the causing of physical injury to school district or BOCES supervisory personnel whether or not such person is engaged in supervision or instruction at the time such injury is caused within the crime of assault in the second degree.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the offense of assault in the second degree in certain instances
